name: Purgatorial Ascension 2023
description:
PURGATORIAL ASCENSION

Your arrogance as king has angered a god from another plane of existence!
Show it who's boss through an epic bullet hell battle!

Controls:
- Run with arrow keys
- Jump with spacebar
- Talk to the shopkeeper with Z
- Swing your sword with X (once it is unlocked)
- Dodge roll and air dash with C (once they are unlocked)
- Aim your sword throw with Shift (once it is unlocked)

Credits:
Arman A. - Boss attacks/Leaderboard
Oliver B. - Player Abilities/Systems/Art/Animation/Sound Design
Music is “Bass Music” by Umziky
